django.contrib.auth.management
==============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.auth.management

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Creates permissions for all installed apps that need permissions.



Submodules
----------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   /autoapi/django/contrib/auth/management/commands/index


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.auth.management.create_permissions
   django.contrib.auth.management.get_system_username
   django.contrib.auth.management.get_default_username


Package Contents
----------------

.. py:function:: create_permissions(app_config, verbosity=2, interactive=True, using=DEFAULT_DB_ALIAS, apps=global_apps, **kwargs)

.. py:function:: get_system_username()

   Return the current system user's username, or an empty string if the
   username could not be determined.


.. py:function:: get_default_username(check_db=True, database=DEFAULT_DB_ALIAS)

   Try to determine the current system user's username to use as a default.

   :param check_db: If ``True``, requires that the username does not match an
       existing ``auth.User`` (otherwise returns an empty string).
   :param database: The database where the unique check will be performed.
   :returns: The username, or an empty string if no username can be
       determined or the suggested username is already taken.
